comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
As the obituary linked above indicates, Marjorie Leichner Rafal just died this month (October 2009).  She was 93.  She was a Wellesley alumna, a teacher in Hartford, a writer, a great-grandmother, and "a renowned constructor of crossword puzzles."  

Does anyone know where this step is (probably in the Hartford area)?  Would make a good then-and-now.
